name: National Instruments
body:
### Welcome to the National Instruments GitHub

The @ni organization hosts a number of repositories used with [National Instruments](http://www.ni.com) products, in two general categories:

1. Open source software used to create the NI Linux RT distribution, which is supported through <https://decibel.ni.com/content/groups/ni-linux-real-time>, and 
2. NI-specific projects where we are collaborating with our users on GitHub, which are supported through <https://decibel.ni.com/content/groups/community-source-of-ni-code> and work in conjunction with the @ni-dev GitHub organization.

Please refer to the individual repositories for project-specific details.

NI engineers with questions about GitHub can refer to the [internal FAQ](https://nitalk.jiveon.com/thread/59630).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
